name: create_collection
description: Create a new collection to store documents. Collections are analogous to tables in a SQL database.

collection_name.description: The name for the new collection. Must be unique within the database.

name: delete_collection
description: Permanently delete an entire collection and all documents within it. This action cannot be undone.

collection_name.description: The name of the collection to delete.

name: create_index
description: Create an index on a specific field within a collection to significantly speed up query performance.

collection_name.description: The collection on which to create the index.

field_name.description: The name of the field to index. For nested fields, use dot notation (e.g., 'user.address.zipcode').

unique.description: Optional. If true, enforces that all values for this field in the collection must be unique.

name: create_document
description: Add a new document to a specified collection. The document should be a valid JSON object.

collection_name.description: The name of the collection where the document will be stored.

document_data.description: A JSON object representing the document to be created. The database will automatically assign a unique ID.

document_id.description: Optional. A specific unique ID for the document. If not provided, the database will generate one.

name: get_document
description: Retrieve a single document from a collection by its unique ID.

document_id.description: The unique ID of the document to retrieve.

name: update_document
description: Update an existing document in a collection. This replaces the entire document with the new data provided.

collection_name.description: The collection containing the document to update.

document_id.description: The unique ID of the document to update.

update_data.description: A JSON object representing the new state of the document.

name: delete_document
description: Permanently delete a single document from a collection by its unique ID.

collection_name.description: The collection containing the document to delete.

document_id.description: The unique ID of the document to delete.

name: query_documents
description: Execute a TissQL query against a collection to find, filter, and retrieve multiple documents.

collection_name.description: The collection to run the query against.

tissql_query.description: The TissQL query string. Example: "SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE brand = 'TechGear' AND price < 300"

limit.description: Optional. The maximum number of documents to return. Used for pagination.

offset.description: Optional. The number of documents to skip from the beginning of the result set. Used for pagination.

name: list_collections
description: List all collections currently in the database.

name: get_collection_stats
description: Retrieve statistics for a specific collection, such as document count, total size, and index information.

collection_name.description: The name of the collection to get statistics for.

name: list_indexes
description: List all indexes created on a specific collection.

collection_name.description: The name of the collection to list indexes for.

name: patch_document
description: Partially update an existing document with new field values. This only modifies the specified fields, leaving others untouched.

collection_name.description: The collection containing the document to patch.

document_id.description: The unique ID of the document to patch.

patch_data.description: A JSON object containing the fields and new values to apply to the document.

name: bulk_create_documents
description: Add multiple new documents to a specified collection in a single operation for improved performance.

collection_name.description: The name of the collection where the documents will be stored.

documents.description: An array of JSON objects, where each object represents a document to be created.
